si.t: Everyone can help by just cutting box tops of products and sending to school.
Distributing birthday ribbons to students throughout the school year.
Copy, collate and distribute monthly newsletter.
Help sale HES spirit wear at school functions.
Assistance is needed to organize and implement this National Arts Recognition program.
Help organize and coordinate a breakfast for grades K, 1 and 2 at school in December.
Help in distributing products when they arrive prior to the winter break.
Assist with ticket sales and the solicitation of donations. Help is needed to organize, set up, run and break down the event. This event takes place in March.
HES' newest (and popular) club that meets once a month to build!

Team members plan ways to show appreciation to HES staff. The event takes place during the first week of May with occasional meetings starting in March. You do not need to be available the entire week.
** Not sure how to volunteer at HES or what you need to do to volunteer?
HELP MAKE YOUR CHILD'S SCHOOL EXPERIENCE A GREAT ONE!
Join the VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE at HES!
Assist in organizing activities for the 5th grade class including year end picnic & graduation.
A parent/child event held in the school gym for grades 3-5. Help is needed for scheduling music, acitivities and refreshments. The dance takes place in Feb. K-2 parents needed to help at event.
Plan Family Nights with local restaurants and distribute flyers to promote
Help by copying & collating PTA membership information, collect PTA dues at various functions, and increase awareness of the PTA’s contributions.
Help plan activities for event. Team members also help on the day of the event which takes place in May. It's HES own carnival (on a small scale).
Your talent and time are needed to make all programs successful for our children! Do not feel you need to be available during school or attend meetings because we can use your help in many ways!
If you are interested in volunteering in any of these areas, please contact school at 410-638-4170!
Our CAFETERIA, LIBRARY and OFFICE are always in need of volunteers!
Follow us on Facebook...Hickory Elementary School PTA
Coordinate scholarship applications with area high schools & choose scholarship recipient.
Help coordinate pictures and information for yearbook.
Distribute donation sheets and collect funds. Help to organize event.
Assist with ticket sales and the solicitation of donations. Help is need to organize, set up and break down at the event. This event takes place in November (and it sells out!)
Help make crafts for the sale or collect donations. Need volunteers for set up and to work the day of the sale. This fun event takes place in early Dec.
Work with Redners and Coke Rewards
Order and organize lunch for teachers on conference day.
Administer Hickory Elementary School PTA facebook page
Help to organize and set up for two nights of
family fun and exercise - Fall and Spring.
Organize tasks and volunteers for Patriot Program

If you are ready to help, but not sure what to do…we would love to help you find a way that suits your time and talents. Please don't be intimidated by this long list or if you are just not sure how it all works! It's all fun and we can help answer your questions. Email or call anyone listed to discuss!
Join us on September 15 at 7:00 pm for our Volunteer Orientation Meeting**
